name: Java Gradle Game Development
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'wget -q https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.5-bin.zip && unzip -q gradle-8.5-bin.zip && sudo mv gradle-8.5 /opt/gradle && sudo ln -sf /opt/gradle/bin/gradle /usr/local/bin/gradle && rm gradle-8.5-bin.zip && java -version && gradle -v'
